doc.title: Hollywood Car Wash
doc.plot: Amy Spencer dreams of moving to New York and starring in art-house films. But when she signs her up to audition for a "mysterious television project", she blows the competition away with her girl-next-door looks and impressive acting chops, Amy winds up starring on a network television series. To keep the role she never wanted, Amy takes a spin through the "Hollywood Car Wash" -- new clothes, new friends, and a high-profile boyfriend. Will Amy get caught up by all the glitz or will she get a grip on her life before it's too late?
